special_text:
Whenever you lose life for the first time during each of your turns, put two loyalty counters on Lieve, Noonday Witch.
[+1]: Journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven’t already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
[-5]: Destroy target permanent.
[-9]: Target player loses 2 life, exiles a card from their hand, and exiles a permanent they control. Repeat this process for each card type among cards in graveyards.
